meanings.definition: To stay awake longer than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She always outwatches her little brother during movie nights.
meanings.sent2: The owl outwatches the other birds at night.
meanings.sent3: The cat outwatches the mouse, waiting for the perfect moment to pounce.
meanings.sent4: Time outwatches us all, never stopping for anyone.
meanings.sent5: Outwatches like a vigilant guardian, never letting sleep take over.

meanings.definition: To surpass in watching or observing.
meanings.sent1: The detective outwatches all others in solving mysteries.
meanings.sent2: The scientist outwatches the behavior of the ants in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The spy outwatches the target, gathering valuable information.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for stargazing outwatches any other hobby she has.
meanings.sent5: Outwatches with keen eyes, noticing every detail others might miss.
